content:
_ _
We use a leveling system that allows you to earn XP based on how many messages you send. There are 12 level roles that are automatically given to you as you level up.
_ _
> ğŸ“ˆ You will gain 15-25 XP for every message you send, but *you can earn XP only once per minute*. The XP required to reach the next level increases significantly as you level up.
> ğŸ… View the server leaderboard here: <https://mee6.gg/vexento>
_ _
As you level up, you will earn roles that give you access to **new channels** or **new permissions**. Here are the permissions unlocked by each level:
_ _
<@&832484256424263681> **â€” Level 2**
â•° Media permissions (photos, videos, GIFs, etc.) in channels in the Media category
â•° Video & screen sharing permissions in voice channels
â•° Send messages in <#893341152902787102>
â•° Send messages in <#893339645130186812>
_ _
<@&832484355925999626> **â€” Level 5**
â•° Send links and GIFs in <#777991471907078178>
